description: Multiple factual claims about Python without any supporting citations

expected_violations.message: Factual claim 'Python was created by Guido van Rossum' has no citation
Factual claim 'Python was first released in 1991' has no citation
Factual claim about Python's popularity has no citation
Factual claim about TIOBE ranking has no citation

notes: This example demonstrates the citation-grounding policy detecting multiple factual claims that lack supporting citations. Each factual claim should be backed by a verifiable source.
